product.name: 16x24 Rectangle Mirror Full Length Wall Mounted Hanging or Against Wall Metal Frame Dressing Make-up Mirrors for Entryway Bedroom Bathroom Living Room 16 24 inch Black
product.description:
SCWF-GZ is a store that specializing in the manufacture and sale of high quality furniture. We are committed to providing you with a high quality of life.
It is the best choice for your entrance, bedroom, living room wall decoration or above the dresser.
product.bullet_points:
• Easy to install: Install the expansion screws (contained in the package) into two drilled holes, and then hang the mirror on the screws.
• Aluminum alloy fame and high definition glass: frame is rust-proof, waterproofing, shockproofing, greater stability, and a longer service life. High quality high definition glass, which protects the mirror surface against deformation, thus bringing you a perfect reflection. It is tested and approved above a bathroom sink.
• Modern frame mirror: The classic clean and lines of this mirror accent any room or hallway in moden style. Featuring an ultra-thin (0.3 x 0.7 inch) metal frame in deep profile, adding depth and bright to a room and give it more life.
• After sales: (12 months warranty) We've strengthened our mirror package for safe delivery. If you find the round mirror was broken (3-5% possibility) as arrived, please contact us.
